subject: Attention
body:
Attention
 
Sequel to the meeting held last week Friday at Aso Villa Abuja, FCT.  In line with the Executive Order signed by President Bola Ahmed Tinubu, be informed that we are instructed to pay all outstanding local and foreign debt accruing from INHERITANCE/CONTRACT, AND SCAM VICTIMS TRAPPED IN LOCAL AND FOREIGN BANKS.
 
According to our records and in executing the order from the United States Presidency, we discovered that you were among the people misled by some Individuals and officials, who took advantage of you, and as a result, demanded one payment after another from you without releasing your funds to you.
 
It is our pleasure, therefore, to inform you that your funds are now ready for your claim and will be released to you hours after your response to this email. To have your money without further delays, you are to get back to us with your Full Name Address, and Telephone Number for Clarification as required so that your payment will be processed immediately.
 
You are warned to stop any further communication with whoever concerning your payment with effect from today, this is to enable you to receive your money successfully without further hitches. Your payment file is right here and we are set to complete your payment as instructed by the Presidency and the Ministry of Internal Affairs.
As you are advised to reply via this  Email: 
usdibens@gmail.com
 
Further advice shall be given to you as soon as we hear from you.
 
YOURS FAITHFULLY
 
Jackson Steve
For:
Ministry of Internal Affairs.
Aso Villa Abuja, FCT

subject: Re:   Attention
body:
Hello Jackson Steve,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in helping me claim my funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

1. Can you provide more details about the Executive Order signed by President Bola Ahmed Tinubu? What does it entail and how does it affect the release of my funds?

2. How did you come across my name as one of the scam victims? Is there any specific incident or case that led to this discovery?

3. Could you please clarify what you mean by "stop any further with whoever concerning your payment"? Are there any specific individuals or organizations I should avoid contacting regarding my funds?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Joseph
